content.value:
Once upon a time #WeMetOnTwitter and then we escaped a container on a mainframe together, did a DEF CON talk about it, and now here we are! ðŸ¥°

I love you so much, @bigendiansmalls. Let's keep hacking all the things and making each other happy for a really long time, ok?

photo.alt: @bigendiansmalls making me blush when we were recording our talk
@bigendiansmalls and me beaming with each other at Sagrada Familia
